sentences.chinese: 孝景皇帝者，孝文之中子也。
sentences.literal: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen.
His mother was Empress Dou.

sentences.chinese: 孝文在代時，前后有三男，及竇太后得幸，前后死，及三子更死，故孝景得立。
sentences.literal: When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.
In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world.
On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level.

sentences.chinese: 五月，除田半租，為孝文立太宗廟。
sentences.literal: Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen.
Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations.
The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.

sentences.chinese: 二年春，封故相國蕭何孫系為武陵侯。
sentences.literal: Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.
Men at twenty receive registration.
Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died.
Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs.
Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died.

sentences.chinese: 八月，以御史大夫開封陶青為丞相。
sentences.literal: Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor.
Comet appeared in the northeast.

sentences.chinese: 秋，衡山雨雹，大者五寸，深者二尺。
sentences.literal: Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet.
Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen.
Moon appeared between Beichen.
Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court.

sentences.chinese: 置南陵及內史、祋祤為縣。
sentences.literal: Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.
Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world.
Long star appeared in the west.

sentences.chinese: 天火燔雒陽東宮大殿城室。
sentences.literal: Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms.

sentences.chinese: 吳王濞、楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠反，發兵西鄉。
sentences.literal: Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west.

sentences.chinese: 天子為誅晁錯，遣袁盎諭告，不止，遂西圍梁。
sentences.literal: The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west.

sentences.chinese: 上乃遣大將軍竇嬰、太尉周亞夫將兵誅之。
sentences.literal: The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them.
Sixth month on the day Binghai.

sentences.chinese: 赦亡軍及楚元王子藝等與謀反者。
sentences.literal: Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion.

sentences.chinese: 封大將軍竇嬰為魏其侯。
sentences.literal: Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.

sentences.chinese: 立楚元王子平陸侯禮為楚王。
sentences.literal: Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King.

sentences.chinese: 立皇子端為膠西王，子勝為中山王。
sentences.literal: Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King.

sentences.chinese: 徙濟北王志為菑川王，淮陽王餘為魯王，汝南王非為江都王。
sentences.literal: Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King.
Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.
Fourth year summer, established the crown prince.
Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King.
Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world.

sentences.chinese: 後九月，更以（弋）［易］陽為陽陵。
sentences.literal: After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling.
Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit.
Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.
Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge.

sentences.chinese: 五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。
sentences.literal: Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand.

sentences.chinese: 江都大暴風從西方來，壞城十二丈。
sentences.literal: Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang.

sentences.chinese: 丁卯，封長公主子蟜為隆慮侯。
sentences.literal: On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu.
Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.

sentences.chinese: 六年春，封中尉（趙）綰為建陵侯，江都丞相嘉為建平侯，隴西太守渾邪為平曲侯，趙丞相嘉為江陵侯，故將軍布為鄃侯。
sentences.literal: Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju.
Liang and Chu two kings both died.

sentences.chinese: 後九月，伐馳道樹，殖蘭池。
sentences.literal: After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.

sentences.chinese: 七年冬，廢栗太子為臨江王。
sentences.literal: Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King.
Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun.
Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling.
